title: Prescription for glasses or contact lenses in the UK 2014 , by country
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 5 different Countrys for 2 groups Yes, and No that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Scotland had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Yes. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Country Scotland for No.
In Country Scotland, Yes had the highest Share of respondents among all 5 Countrys and it has the lowest Share of respondents in Country Wales.
There is a gap of 18.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Yes in Country Scotland and Wales.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Yes, and No. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
In Country Scotland, Yes had the highest Share of respondents 84.0 among the 2 groups and in Scotland, No had the lowest Share of respondents 16.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 5 different Countrys for 2 groups Yes, and No that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Scotland had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Yes. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Country Scotland for No.
In Country Scotland, Yes had the highest Share of respondents among all 5 Countrys and it has the lowest Share of respondents in Country Wales.
There is a gap of 18.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Yes in Country Scotland and Wales.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Yes, and No. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
In Country Scotland, Yes had the highest Share of respondents 84.0 among the 2 groups and in Scotland, No had the lowest Share of respondents 16.0.
Among all the Countrys, Yes had the highest Share of respondents in Country Scotland and lowest Share of respondents in Country Wales.
The maximum Share of respondents for Yes that was found in Country Scotland was 1.27 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents observed in Country Wales.
Among all 2 groups, Yes had the gap of 18.0 between the maximum and minimum Share of respondents observed in Country Scotland and Wales respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups Yes, and No, the Country Northern Ireland is the maximum Share of respondents and Wales is the minimum Share of respondents.
